attributes.action: make it illegal for any money arising out of the UK national lottery to be spent outside of the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If there was ever a case for using the phrase 'Charity Begins At Home' this is it.  I have not been able to find, in hundreds of hours of searching, one example of lottery money from countries outside the UK being given to non-specific charities inside the UK.
